mapper.select: SELECT IF(ISNULL(SUM(take_num)), 0, SUM(take_num)) AS takeNum FROM fm_recyle_log WHERE uid = #{uid} AND recyle_type = 1 AND take_type IN (4, 7)

SELECT f.id, b.nickname, a.nickname AS stealName, f.take_num AS takeNum, f.take_date AS takeDate, f.recyle_type AS recyleType, f.take_msg AS takeMsg FROM fm_recyle_log f LEFT JOIN hc_account b ON f.uid = b.id LEFT JOIN hc_account a ON f.uid = a.id WHERE TO_DAYS(f.take_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND f.take_type = 0 AND f.friend_id = #{uid} ORDER BY f.take_date DESC

SELECT c.nickname, c.logo, c.my_p AS myP, t.id, t.uid, SUM(t.take_num) AS takeNum FROM fm_recyle_log t LEFT JOIN hc_account c ON t.uid = c.id WHERE TO_DAYS(t.take_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND t.take_type = 0 AND t.recyle_type = 2 GROUP BY t.uid ORDER BY takeNum DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(t.take_num) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(t.take_num) END AS cntNum FROM fm_recyle_log t WHERE TO_DAYS(t.take_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND t.take_type = 0 AND t.recyle_type = 1 AND t.uid = #{uid}
